LanguageData.ExtratisinumTolerance.label: Extratisinum tolerance
LanguageData.ExtratisinumTolerance.description: Resin-like viscous substance. After use, it greatly increases visual acuity and hearing, giving vigor. It causes a strong dependence, requiring constant consumption to maintain the effect.

LanguageData.ExtratisinumHediff.description: Resin-like viscous substance. After use, it greatly increases visual acuity and hearing, giving vigor. It causes a strong dependence, requiring constant consumption to maintain the effect.
